name: dserv
description: Node.js mini http server for frontend dev
readme:
# dserv

Node.js mini http server for frontend development.
Compiles Jade templates and Stylus CSS on the fly.
Serves static files (e.g. images, video) as-is.

It's a quick & dirty hack... could use several improvements :)

## INSTALLATION

    npm install dserv -g

## USAGE

    dserv [PORT]

- Serves files under the current directory, on port 8000 by default.
- Request `foo.html` -\> render `foo.jade`
- Request `bar.css` -\> compile `bar.styl` as needed
